message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40%.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. Let's meet in the middle - closer to an even split.
While your offer is a bit more balanced, Bob, I think we can still find a solution that benefits us both a bit more. Let's see what the next round brings.
Okay, Bob, how about this? I understand you want a more even split, but time is money! This offer still gives you a good share.
Alice, we're getting closer, but this deal needs to be fair for both of us. This offer considers that time is running out.
Alright, Bob, you drive a hard bargain! Let's take it - better to have a deal than lose everything to inflation.
